8#include "decklink_sdk/DeckLinkAPI.h"
9#include "libdecklink/errors.hpp"
10#include "libdecklink/decklink_handle_deleter.hpp"
11
12namespace DeckLink {
13
14 template<typename InterfaceType>
15 void load_interface(
16 IDeckLink *device,
17 REFIID interface_id,
18 std::unique_ptr<InterfaceType, IDeckLinkHandleDeleter>& dest,
19 const std::string& interface_name
20 ) {
21 if (!device) {
22 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(null_pointer_error() << errmsg("device was null"));
23 }
24
25 void *interface_ptr = nullptr;
26 const HRESULT result = device->QueryInterface(interface_id, &interface_ptr);
27
28 if (result != S_OK) {
29 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
30 << errmsg("Unable to retrieve " + interface_name + " interface")
31 << decklink_error_code(static_cast<HResult>(result))
32 );
33 }
34
35 assert(interface_ptr);
36 dest.reset(static_cast<InterfaceType*>(interface_ptr));
37 }
38}
